name: Halloween Folk Art Witch Doll Ornament cloth clay glass eye
description:
Halloween is almost here! This witch ornaments is from a series of witch doll ornaments I've done. She was sculpted from cloth and stone clay then painted with pastel and sealed with matte varnish. Her torso and skirt is made of cotton and has hand stitching embellishment. Her arms and legs are made of sticks, her hair is dyed flax and her one eye is made of glass.

Use the coupon code SEASONSGREETINGS at checkout and receive 20% off your purchase, expires Dec 31.

She is about 9" tall and there is a loop attached to her head so she can be hung anywhere.

image copyright cindy riccardelli 2013


Shipping Fees:
US - alone 3.00, with another item 1.00
Canada -alone 4.00, with another item 1.00
Everywhere Else - alone 7.00, with another item 3.00

Next day shipping from payment received

name: Folk art doll stick legged pumpkin head
description:
This primitive folk art pumpkin head doll was sculpted from cotton and paperclay, then painted with acrylics and oil paints.

Her eyes are made of handmade lampwork glass and her limbs are made of carved sticks.  Her hand sewn dress is made of tea stained cotton and is adorned with a vintage button and a bumble bee patch.  She is 11" tall, can be hung on a wall from the loop that is sewn to her back, sit or be displayed on the doll stand that is included.

Use the coupon code SEASONSGREETINGS at checkout and receive 20% off your purchase, expires Dec 31.

image copyright cindy riccardelli 2013

Shipping Fees:
Us: alone 6.00, with another item 3.00
Canada: alone 7.00, with another item 4.00
Everywhere Else: alone 16.00, with another item 6.00

Next day shipping from payment received

name: Primitive painted cloth folk art doll turnip dress - Corina
description:
Corina is from a Coraline inspired series of primitive button eyed painted cloth dolls.  Her dress is made of stained linen and cashmere, is hand stitched and painted, she has antique button eyes, seed bead teeth and flax hair that is sewn on.  She is 14" tall, can sit or be displayed on a wall from the hemp loop that is sewn to her back (as shown in the photo)

Use the coupon code SEASONSGREETINGS at checkout and receive 20% off your purchase, expires Dec 31.

Image copyright cindy riccardelli 2013
